user.title: Broadlink Curtain Configuration
user.description:
Please fill in the Broadlink device and curtain configuration.

**Tips:**
- IP address format: 192.168.1.100
- MAC address format: aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff
- RF codes need to be learned from Broadlink app

data_description.host: LAN IP address of Broadlink device, e.g.: 192.168.1.100
data_description.mac: MAC address of Broadlink device, e.g.: e8:70:72:9e:a2:35
data_description.name: Display name of the curtain, e.g.: Living Room Curtain
data_description.open_code: Open RF code learned from Broadlink app (hexadecimal)
data_description.close_code: Close RF code learned from Broadlink app (hexadecimal)
data_description.stop_code: Stop RF code learned from Broadlink app (hexadecimal)
data_description.open_time: Time required to fully open the curtain (seconds), needs actual measurement
data_description.close_time: Time required to fully close the curtain (seconds), needs actual measurement

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Broadlink device, please check IP address and network connection
error.invalid_host: Invalid IP address format, please use IPv4 format, e.g.: 192.168.1.100
error.invalid_mac: Invalid MAC address format, please use format like: aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff
error.invalid_code: Invalid RF code format, please use hexadecimal format
error.invalid_time: Time value must be between 1-300 seconds

abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
